title: TALENT FEST COMPETITION
text: Cultural Extravaganza which includes different competitions. Mandatory participation of Students. Top overall scorers are declared as the Kalashiromani (Female) & Kalapraveen (Male)

title: BOOK WEEK COMPETITION
text: To promote the habit of reading and appreciation for literature and language. Various competitions are also held such as Outer Cover Design Competition, Biography of Authors, Poster Making, Caption/Slogan and Picturisation.

title: CHACHA NEHRU COMPETITION
text: Fancy Dress Competition for LKG to Grade 3 Students who come dressed as the former Prime Minister of India, Jawaharlal Nehru on the occasion of Children’s Day.

title: RANGOLI COMPETITION
text: Competition for Grade 10 students in rangoli art in which patterns are created on the floor using materials such as colored rice, dry flour, colored sand etc.

title: INDOOR/OUTDOOR SPORTS
text: Conducted during Sports Week for different indoor games such as carroms, chess, badminton, scrabble, table tennis and outdoor games such as basketball, volleyball, football, tennis and track and field events…
